tasks.title: Initialize Git repository and push to GitHub
tasks.description: Create local git repo, add .gitignore, LICENSE, README.md, push to legomaheggoz-source/PharmacoBench

tasks.title: Create project directory structure
tasks.description: Create all directories as per architecture: app/, data/, models/, evaluation/, utils/, tests/, docs/, agents/

tasks.title: Create requirements.txt and pyproject.toml
tasks.description: Define all Python dependencies: streamlit, pandas, numpy, scipy, sklearn, xgboost, lightgbm, torch, torch-geometric, rdkit, plotly, optuna, pytest, ruff, huggingface_hub

tasks.title: Create Dockerfile for HuggingFace Spaces
tasks.description: Create Dockerfile with Python 3.10, install dependencies, configure Streamlit on port 7860

tasks.title: Create .streamlit/config.toml
tasks.description: Configure Streamlit theme, layout, and server settings for Aurora Solar-inspired design

tasks.title: Implement GDSC data downloader
tasks.description: Create data/downloader.py to fetch GDSC1, GDSC2 IC50 data, cell line info, and compounds from cancerrxgene.org with caching

tasks.title: Implement data preprocessor
tasks.description: Create data/preprocessor.py for log IC50 transformation, missing value handling, cell line filtering, Z-score normalization

tasks.title: Implement feature engineer
tasks.description: Create data/feature_engineer.py for gene expression features, SMILES to molecular graphs (PyTorch Geometric), multi-omics integration

tasks.title: Implement data splitters
tasks.description: Create data/splitters.py with 4 strategies: random_split, drug_blind_split, cell_blind_split, disjoint_split

tasks.title: Create BaseModel abstract interface
tasks.description: Create models/base_model.py with abstract methods: fit, predict, get_hyperparameters, save, load

tasks.title: Implement Ridge Regression model
tasks.description: Create models/traditional/ridge.py implementing BaseModel with sklearn Ridge, hyperparameter grid

tasks.title: Implement ElasticNet model
tasks.description: Create models/traditional/elasticnet.py implementing BaseModel with sklearn ElasticNet

tasks.title: Implement Random Forest model
tasks.description: Create models/traditional/random_forest.py implementing BaseModel with sklearn RandomForestRegressor

tasks.title: Implement XGBoost model
tasks.description: Create models/traditional/xgboost_model.py implementing BaseModel with xgboost.XGBRegressor

tasks.title: Implement LightGBM model
tasks.description: Create models/traditional/lightgbm_model.py implementing BaseModel with lightgbm.LGBMRegressor

tasks.title: Implement MLP model
tasks.description: Create models/deep_learning/mlp.py implementing BaseModel with PyTorch MLP, training loop

tasks.title: Implement GraphDRP model
tasks.description: Create models/deep_learning/graphdrp.py with GCN drug encoder, 1D CNN cell encoder, prediction head

tasks.title: Implement DeepCDR model
tasks.description: Create models/deep_learning/deepcdr.py with GCN drug encoder, multi-omics encoders (mutation, expression, methylation), fusion layer

tasks.title: Implement evaluation metrics
tasks.description: Create evaluation/metrics.py with RMSE, MAE, R2, Pearson, Spearman functions

tasks.title: Implement benchmark runner
tasks.description: Create evaluation/benchmark_runner.py to orchestrate model training, evaluation across all splits, result aggregation

tasks.title: Create Streamlit main entry point
tasks.description: Create app/main.py with page config, navigation, Aurora-inspired styling, caching setup

tasks.title: Create Dashboard page
tasks.description: Create app/pages/1_Dashboard.py with KPI cards, summary metrics, quick navigation

tasks.title: Create Data Explorer page
tasks.description: Create app/pages/2_Data_Explorer.py with dataset stats, distributions, missing value analysis

tasks.title: Create Model Training page
tasks.description: Create app/pages/3_Model_Training.py with model selection, hyperparameter controls, progress tracking

tasks.title: Create Benchmark Results page
tasks.description: Create app/pages/4_Benchmark_Results.py with performance tables, heatmaps, model comparisons

tasks.title: Create Drug Analysis page
tasks.description: Create app/pages/5_Drug_Analysis.py with 2D structure viewer, sensitivity profiles, rankings

tasks.title: Create Cell Line Analysis page
tasks.description: Create app/pages/6_Cell_Line_Analysis.py with tissue types, genomic features, predictions

tasks.title: Create UI components library
tasks.description: Create app/components/ with charts.py, molecule_viewer.py, metrics_cards.py, data_tables.py

tasks.title: Create Aurora-inspired CSS styling
tasks.description: Create app/styles/aurora.css with clean palette, card layouts, consistent spacing

tasks.title: Create test fixtures and conftest
tasks.description: Create tests/conftest.py with pytest fixtures for sample data, models, configurations

tasks.title: Create data pipeline tests
tasks.description: Create tests/test_data/ with tests for downloader, preprocessor, feature_engineer, splitters

tasks.title: Create model tests
tasks.description: Create tests/test_models/ with tests for all 8 models: fit, predict, save, load

tasks.title: Create evaluation tests
tasks.description: Create tests/test_evaluation/ with tests for metrics, benchmark_runner

tasks.title: Create README.md
tasks.description: Write comprehensive README with project overview, installation, quick start, features

tasks.title: Create PRODUCT.md
tasks.description: Write full user guide with screenshots, feature explanations, usage examples

tasks.title: Create STACK.md
tasks.description: Document technology choices and architecture decisions with rationale

tasks.title: Create PROBLEM.md
tasks.description: Explain drug sensitivity prediction challenge, IC50, clinical relevance

tasks.title: Create SOLUTION.md
tasks.description: Document why each model was selected, benchmarking methodology, expected results

tasks.title: Create API.md
tasks.description: Document all module interfaces, function signatures, usage examples

tasks.title: Create GitHub Actions CI workflow
tasks.description: Create .github/workflows/ci.yml with lint (ruff), type check, pytest on PR

tasks.title: Create GitHub Actions CD workflow
tasks.description: Create .github/workflows/deploy.yml to deploy to HuggingFace Spaces on main merge

tasks.title: Deploy to HuggingFace Spaces
tasks.description: Upload to legomaheggo/PharmacoBench, configure secrets, verify deployment
